name: Road Path Creator
description:
Just a simple road creator for Unity. I created this tool for another project and I decided to submit it to this jam.

The tool has some issues, for example when you create a sharp bend, the road gets distorted.

Maybe this can be used also for plataformers to create curve plataformers, but it needs some changes in the code.

* I promise that I will upload the code to github tomorrow * :D
